Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I Caved .Bought from KSP.com this Morning, Look forward to chatting to you all.

Thanks

SjG

Edited February 7, 2014 by SjG
Emotional Plea no long needed

Welcome : ) In the name of all KSP addicts here, I salute you!

Now go build some rockets. Talk to us when you have reached the Mun.

Welcome! You've just entered what is potentially the best place on the internet. If you're stuck, watch Scott Manley or one from a whole host of KSP-based Youtubers. Want to do something fun or cry with laughter at bugs? Danny2462's for you.

But enough of that, if you have any questions, do ask them. Any at all, we'll answer.
